'''Mines of Moria''' is the first part of the trilogy [[Mines of Moria (Video game series)|Mines of Moria]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mom.html Mines of Moria] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 17 April 2011)</ref><ref name="El Anillo">[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=GEN&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=9 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 10 (retrieved 17 April 2011)</ref> You play as [[Feagwaith]], who entered [[Moria]] in search of ''[[Mithril]]''.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="El Anillo"/> It was written by [[Adam Roberts]] with [[Klik & Play]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu, 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 17 April 2011)</ref>
